name: Perfectly Normal Apartment
description:
Made for PIGSquad's Horror/"Don't Let It Out" Jam (Summer Slow Jams, August 2020)

Art, Code, Writing: NextLevelBanana

Music: Hodge

A tiny Maniac Mansionlike made using Liquidream's SCUMM-8 Engine.

No jump scares! It's not scary. It's, I hope, weird and funny.

*** Note: it's done but will definitely be receiving some polishing/bugfix updates between now and the showcase!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
C O N T R O L S

Mouse to point and click

The game auto-saves your progress. Hit <enter> to get the pause menu, which will let you clear your data and start over.
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

If you get stuck, hit me up on Twitter for a hint!
